text: hrux phwk khea klaw wa khea (muhammad) di xuplokn khwam thec hı kæ xallxhˌ dangnan ha kxallxhˌ thrng prasngkh phraxngkh ca thrng phnuk hawcı cea kdi læa xallxhˌ thrng khcad khwam thec hı hmd pi læa thrng yunyan khwam cring dwy kha klaw khxng phraxngkh (xalkurxan) thæcring phraxngkh thrng rxbru sing thi xyu nı thrwngxk
